description: Try our easy to follow Soy & Orange Salmon With Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Soy & Orange Salmon With Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 700g skinless salmon fillets, 4 x 175 g each

recipeInstructions.text: Remove any bones from the salmon fillets and put the salmon in a bowl. Heat a heavy-based frying pan until hot and spray lightly with oil. Add the salmon and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Remove from the pan, wrap loosely in foil and leave to rest for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook the noodles in a large saucepan of boiling water for about 5 minutes, or according to the packet instructions, until just tender.
While the noodles are cooking, mix together the soy sauce, orange juice and mirin in a bowl, then pour into the frying pan and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 1 minute.
Drain the noodles well, return to the pan and toss with the sesame oil and sprinkle over the seeds. Divide the salmon among 4 serving bowls and top with the sauce. Serve with steamed sugar snap peas.
